metadata.name: Small One Or Three Chambers
metadata.description: Smaller version of the multi-chamber environment with 2 human agents and 1 robot agent. Features internal walls, a rock, and a block. Suitable for DAG computation and backward induction.
metadata.author: EMPO Framework
